home.title: Create and Share Static Content
home.subtitle: Transform HTML, Markdown, CSV and Excel files into permanent, shareable links â€” and generate QR codes
home.whatIsDescription: A powerful static application that allows you to create shareable pages and files via link. Your content is compressed and encoded into the URL itself, making it accessible from any device without requiring a database or server storage. Features include live preview, content recovery, theme customization, secure rendering, and QR code generation.
home.howWorksDescription: Your content is compressed using advanced algorithms and encoded directly into the URL. The application supports multiple rendering modes: standard view with header/footer, or full-screen mode for immersive content display. All HTML content is rendered securely in sandboxed iframes, and you can download the original files at any time.
home.htmlDesc: Complete web pages with secure iframe rendering, clickable links, and optional full-screen mode
home.markdownDesc: Formatted documents with theme-aware rendering and syntax highlighting
home.csvDesc: Spreadsheets (CSV and XLSX) converted to interactive, sortable tables
home.qrDescription: Generate QR codes from text or links with export and sharing options
home.qrHowWorksDescription: Paste your text or link, generate a QR code, then customize size, margin, and error correction or export it.
home.qrFeatureGenerate: Generate QR codes from text or links
home.qrFeatureCustomize: Adjust size, margin, and error correction level
home.qrFeatureExport: Export as PNG/SVG, copy image, open in new tab or popup
home.qrFeatureRenderLink: Generate a render link to share the QR code
home.limitsDescription: For optimal performance and user experience:
home.limitsNote: Larger files work, but may generate longer URLs and impact loading time.
home.portfolio: Interactive project portfolios with live demos
home.showcase: Work showcase with full-screen presentation mode
home.sharing: Quick sharing of formatted documents and data tables

create.title: Create New Link
create.urlTooLong: Content is too large to generate a safe link (limit exceeded). Try reducing the size.
create.pasteHash: Paste the full link code here (e.g., md-H4s...)
create.qrInputLabel: Text or link for the QR code
create.qrInputPlaceholder: Paste text or a link here
create.qrHint: Your QR code will appear here

render.title: View Content
render.notFoundDescription: The provided hash does not match any stored content.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

renderError.title: Error Processing File
renderError.description: The file content appears to be corrupted or in an invalid format.
renderError.hint: Usually this happens when the wrong file type was selected during creation.
